sector.narrative: Build resilience to shocks and crisis

condition.narrative: Social and environmental sustainability will be enhanced through application of the UNDP Social and Environmental Standards (http://www.undp.org/ses) and related Accountability Mechanism (http://www.undp.org/secu-srm).
UNDP as the Implementing Partner will comply with the policies, procedures and practices of the United Nations Security Management System (UNSMS.)

description.narrative: 1.1.1. Cumulative number of target communities that have capacities for amalgamation and full volume of required competencies (by oblast) 1.1.2. Cumulative number of community members who learned best practices of amalgamation through study visits 1.1.3. Cumulative number of people reached by the information campaign on decentralization 1.1.4. Cumulative number of people with improved knowledge and skills on gender-responsive planning and budgeting 1.1.5. Cumulative number of Local Gender Coordination Councils established in target communities 1.1.6. Cumulative number of active members of Local Gender Coordination Councils 1.1.7. Cumulative number of models and guidelines developed to provide communities with tools and knowledge on public finance, fiscal decentralization and local governance 1.1.8. Cumulative number of communities that piloted and adopted new models and guidelines, developed by the project 1.1.9. Cumulative number of communities that completed gender accessibility audits 1.2.1. Cumulative number of ASCs and communities which use e-document management systems (by oblast) 1.2.2. Cumulative number of mobile ASCs in isolated areas or areas along the contact line (by oblast) 1.2.3. Cumulative number of people in remote rural areas close to contact line served by mobile ASCs (by oblast) 1.2.4. Cumulative number of ASC staff members with improved capacity and skills to provide quality administrative and social services (by oblast) 1.2.5. Number of remote ASC workstations in target communities (by oblast) 1.2.6. Cumulative number of ASCs equipped with all necessary tools and capacity to provide administrative and social services online (by oblast) 1.2.7. Cumulative number of people who obtained quality administrative and social services online 1.2.8. Cumulative number of successfully implemented initiatives aimed at increasing public participation in decision-making and service provision at the local level (by oblast) 1.2.9.
